item.description:
Climb 5-7PM. Bring a rope and other top rope gear if you have it.

Hey,,, I will try to be at the K wall at 4PM - but just show up and look for me anytime... I will be in green pants (or black pants). Bring a flash light (head lamp) if you want to climb into the night. New climbers are cool. Just let an experienced person know that you are new and need help. I will try to bring an extra harness but you should have your own harness and shoes... what else?... Oh yea, bring warm clothing.
3 cheers:)
Geoff
617 501-6217

If you come late and don't see me ask around. I might be at the C wall behind the little pond. Feel free to call - I might answer my phone.
item.name: 4 weeks in October - Climb Quincy Quarries.
